metadata.name: Ordinateur
metadata.description: The Computer Science Society of Hansraj College

about.prompt: So, what do you guys do exactly?
about.answer:
The Computer Science Society of Hansraj College is not your ordinary organization. We are an intergalactic empire dedicated to saving the world from the dominion of cats and vampires. Our mission is to harness the power of technology and programming to combat these formidable foes and restore balance to the universe. 
Through our advanced research and development, we have created groundbreaking solutions to counter the feline and vampiric threats. Our team of brilliant minds works tirelessly to develop innovative software and hardware that can detect and neutralize these supernatural creatures. With our cutting-edge algorithms and state-of-the-art equipment, we are at the forefront of the battle against the forces of darkness. 
Join us in our quest to protect humanity and ensure a future free from the tyranny of cats and vampires. Together, we can make a difference and create a world where humans can live in peace and harmony, unburdened by the supernatural menace that plagues our society.
